SELECT a.*,IFNULL(b.name,c.name) as customername,e.name as categroyname,g.id as billid, case when a.mode=1 then CONCAT('实重','(',f.weight_min,'~',f.weight_max,')') else a.marker end as brokenmarker FROM bd_broken_goods a left join bd_customer b on a.customer_id=b.id left join bd_supplier c on a.customer_id=c.id left join bd_category e on e.id=a.goods_categroy_id left join bd_specification f on f.id=a.specification_id left join bd_bill g on g.bill_no=a.bill_no where a.dr=0
and a.goods_no=#{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT k.*,a.name as customername ,b.name as categoryname,c.bill_no, case when k.mode=1 then CONCAT('实重','(',d.weight_min,'~',d.weight_max,')') else k.marker end as brokenmarker FROM bd_shipment_goods k left join bd_customer a on a.id=k.customer_id left join bd_category b on b.id=k.goods_category_id left join bd_bill c on c.task_id=k.task_id left join bd_specification d on d.id=k.specification_id
and k.goods_no like '%${_parameter}%'
order by k.createtime desc

SELECT k.*,a.name as suppliername ,b.name as categoryname,f.bill_no, case when k.mode=1 then CONCAT('实重','(',d.weight_min,'~',d.weight_max,')') else k.marker end as brokenmarker FROM bd_goods k left join bd_supplier a on a.id=k.supplier_id left join bd_category b on b.id=k.goods_category_id left join bd_specification d on d.id=k.specification_id left join bd_unload_goods e on e.goods_no=k.goods_no left join bd_bill f on f.task_id=e.task_id where k.goods_no=#{goodsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
